greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways n triples can sit in a row without any siblings next to each other.
comment: a(n) approaches (3n)!*exp(-2) as n goes to infinity.
link: Andrew Woods, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..101
formula: a(n) = A190826(n) * 6^n * n! for n >= 1. - _Nathaniel Johnston_, Aug 01 2011
results.author: _Andrew Woods_, Aug 01 2011
